greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = sum of all parts <= k in the last section of the set of partitions of n.
comment: Row n lists the partial sums of row n of triangle A207383.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275
program: (PARI) Row(n)={my(v=vector(n)); v[1]=numbpart(n-1); if(n>1, forpart(p=n, for(k=1, #p, v[p[k]]++), [2,n])); for(k=2, n, v[k]=v[k-1]+k*v[k]); v}
xref: Column 1 is A000041. Right border gives A138879.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, May 01 2012
ext: Terms a(46) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Feb 19 2020
